pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zi-O (2018, TV show)$(br2)Health: 100$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Uses a $(l:zi_o/riders/woz#shinobi)Futurering form$(/l) at under 50 health$(br2)Drops$(li)2-4 $(l:zi_o/items/blank_watch)Blank Ridewatches$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:zi_o/items/miridewatches#woz_miridewatch)Woz Miridewatch$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:zi_o/items/miridewatches#shinobi_miridewatch)Shinobi Miridewatch$(/l) (30.8%)$(li)1 $(l:zi_o/items/miridewatches#quiz_miridewatch)Quiz Miridewatch$(/l) (30.8%)$(li)1 $(l:zi_o/items/miridewatches#kikai_miridewatch)Kikai Miridewatch$(/l) (30.8%)$(li)1 $(l:zi_o/arsenal/woz_time_majin_ridewatch)White Woz Time Mazine Ridewatch$(/l) (7.7%)
